objects.specification: A sleek, modern exhibition floor composed of glossy tile or polished concrete with a subtle reflective surface in a neutral light-grey tone. It seamlessly abuts all surrounding booth walls without gaps, providing a minimalistic contemporary foundation suitable for showcasing a premium automotive display.

A flat vertical expo wall panel with a smooth neutral finish clad in light grey, standing three meters high and minimal thickness to maximize interior space. Its surface is ideal for mounting banners or branding graphics while maintaining a clean, modern aesthetic.

A flat vertical expo wall panel with a smooth neutral finish clad in light grey, standing three meters high and minimal thickness to maximize interior space. Its surface is ideal for mounting banners or branding graphics while maintaining a clean, modern aesthetic.

A flat vertical expo wall panel with a smooth neutral finish clad in light grey, spanning ten meters wide and three meters tall with a slender profile. It provides a continuous backdrop ideal for event graphics, maintaining a contemporary, minimalist appearance.

children.specification: A large rectangular entrance opening without doors, featuring clean-cut edges and measuring three meters in width by two and a half meters in height. It ensures unobstructed visitor flow and integrates seamlessly into the surrounding wall with a crisp, minimalistic design.

objects.specification: A flat vertical expo wall panel with a smooth neutral finish clad in light grey, spanning ten meters wide and three meters tall with a slender profile. It provides a continuous backdrop ideal for event graphics, maintaining a contemporary, minimalist appearance.

A high-end modern sportscar exhibit with a sleek aerodynamic body, dynamic design lines, and vibrant metallic paint finish. It features detailed headlights, sculpted curves, and premium wheels, scaled to typical passenger-vehicle dimensions and oriented to face the entrance for optimal visibility.

A contemporary reception desk with clean straight lines, featuring a glossy bright red front panel and smooth tabletop surface. It is sized to accommodate one staff member and promotional materials, supported by minimalist leg structures for a modern, inviting look.

A small round glass-top table with a tempered transparent surface and slender polished chrome legs. It measures sixty centimeters in diameter and forty-five centimeters in height, offering a stylish, lightweight spot for visitor discussions.

A modern visitor chair featuring an upholstered seat and backrest in a vibrant green hue, supported by a slim metal frame and tapered legs. It has an ergonomic contour for comfortable seating and a compact footprint.

A vertical rectangular exhibition banner made of lightweight fabric stretched over a slim frame, featuring dynamic car-themed graphics in red, black, and silver tones. The matte finish provides vivid color display and integrates seamlessly with the booth walls.

A small adjustable ceiling-mounted spotlight with a sleek cylindrical housing in matte white. It projects soft yet bright white light through a focused beam aperture, ideal for highlighting the demo car with minimal glare.
